pages.title: Obtaining Enchantments
pages.text: Looking at any entry of a book, you'll see 'Tradeable' & 'Treasure'. $(br)when 'Treasure' is true, it cannot be obtained by enchanting. $(br)when 'Tradeable' is false, it cannot be obtained by trading with villagers. $(br)Please note tho, since we allow a lot of customization, the value may vary in the pack you're playing in
